title: Slow cooker butternut squash, carrot and apple soup
ingredients: ['1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cubed', '4 carrots, peeled and cubed', '2 large apples - peeled, cored and diced', '600ml vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '8 sage leaves', 'creme fraiche, to serve']
